entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023
